item.description:
Hi all, just saw this deal on Groupon for snowmobiling in the White Mountains area, the deal is located at this link.

http://www.groupon.com/deals/sled-ventures-snowmobile-rentals

I just wanted to see what the level of interest is in doing something interesting like snowmobiling. The deal is only valid for one more day though, and is only available for the Sunday-Friday option now, so get it quickly if you are interested. Do note you need a driver's license for this, and a credit card with $1000 available credit.

We'll arrange a date later if enough people are interested.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Snowmobiling in the White Mountains (deal is now on again for now)
